home.title: Hi,  I’m Deyan - a full stack developer who turns ideas into polished digital products
home.tagline: From GO backend and React UIs to Swift-driven apps, I write code that feels fast, reliable and I experiment different practices and designs.

traits.title: Design is just as important as the code
traits.quote: We spend so much time writing beautiful code and top-notch algorithms, the UI deserves just as much respect.
